item.description: We have a 10 AM reservation.The restaurant has parking just past the restaurant. We will all have a pre fix menu for $9.95 + tax & tip. This includes juice, & the choice of Vanilla French toast, Omlette Lyonnaise or Scrambled eggs & Cantal cheese served over toasted brioche. The menu is as stated no changes or substitutes. After breakfast we will walk a block or two to SOWA. You must rsvp on site. YOU MUST BE ON TIME FOR THIS RESERVATION! We can set up car pools.
item.name: Breakfast at Gaslight Bistro & SOWA Market Place
